description: This course teaches the skills necessary for lifeguarding, first aid, AED, CPR, and waterfront guarding certification. Prerequisite: must be able to swim 550 yards (22 lengths).
name: Lifeguard Training
prerequisites: must be able to swim 550 yards (22 lengths).
